text.section:
The Commissioner shall include on each license:
The trade name of the licensee; and
The address at which the business is to be conducted.

section.section: A license authorizes the licensee to do business under the license, at the licensed place of business.
A license does not authorize the licensee to accept deposits or engage otherwise in a banking business except as authorized in this subtitle.
Only one place of business may be maintained under any one license.

text.section:
The Commissioner may issue more than one license to an applicant who:
Complies with § 12-407 of this subtitle; and
Otherwise meets the requirements of this subtitle.
A license may not be transferred or assigned.

section.section: If the licensee has its principal executive office in the State, the licensee shall prominently display the license and unique identifier in the location that is open to the public and at which the licensee engages in the business of money transmission.
If the licensee has its principal executive office outside the State, the licensee shall maintain the license in the principal executive office.
